title: on me by section 7 of the Judicial Appointments Commission Act 2023 (No. 33
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Judicial Appointments Commission Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Judicial Appointments Commission Act 

2023 (Establishment Day) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited judicial appointment commission act 2023 (establishment day) order 2024

title: on me by section 7 of the Judicial Appointments Commission Act 2023 (No. 33
heading: 2. The 1st day of January 2025 is appointed as the establishment day for the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of January 2025 is appointed as the establishment day for the 
purposes of the Judicial Appointments Commission Act 2023 (No. 33 of 2023). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 October, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [554] 3
text_norm: 2 1st day january 2025 appointed establishment day purpose judicial appointment commission act 2023 (no 33 2023) given official seal 17 october 2024 helen mcentee minister justice notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 25th october 2024 554 3

title: on me by section 7 of the Judicial Appointments Commission Act 2023 (No. 33
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the establishment of the Judicial Appointments 
Commission with effect from 1 January 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [554]
